# Blue Ribbon Award (railway)

| country = Japan
| presenter = Japan Railfan Club
| reward =
| year = 1958
| year2 =
| holder = JR West 273 series EMU
| most_awards = Kintetsu Railway
| website = https://www.jrc.gr.jp/e/award/bl
| image2 = Odakyu Romancecar SE 3000 series and GSE 70000 series Ebina depot 20190526.jpg
| image2_size =
| alt2 =
| caption2 = The 1st Prize Odakyu 3000 series SE (left)
The 62nd Prize Odakyu 70000 series GSE
| previous = 67th (2024)
| main = 68th (2025)
| next = 69th (2026)
}}
The  is an award presented annually in Japan since 1958 by the . It is awarded for railway vehicles that entered service in the previous year and were voted by members as being the most outstanding design of the year.
Award winners
The list of award winners since 1958 is as follows.
